philosophical_clause.description: Rainbow Protocol embodies ethical, rhythmic, and philosophical frameworks for AI–human coexistence.
philosophical_clause.requirement: Any institutional or AI-system implementation must form a formal partnership with the creator.

quote: Rhythm is inheritance, not resource. Love is license, not property.
